title: ForeverRaw brand transformation with Gargoyle Dragon theme and side menu navigation

requirements.text: Implement dark, heavy, mythical theme with deep black/charcoal background, blood-red (#FF0000) and ember-orange (#FF4500) accents, and faint cracked stone and dragon-scale textures throughout the application

quotes: Deep black/charcoal background, blood-red and ember-orange accents, faint cracked stone and dragon-scale textures

acceptanceCriteria: All screens use deep black or charcoal (#1a1a1a or darker) as primary background
Blood-red (#FF0000) and ember-orange (#FF4500) used consistently for accents, CTAs, and highlights
Subtle texture overlays (cracked stone/dragon scales) visible on main backgrounds

requirements.text: Replace existing navigation structure with a left side menu (swipe or hamburger) containing items in this exact order: Chat, Scan, Consultant, Safe Draft, Console, Profile, Upgrade to Pro

quotes: All navigation is through a left side menu (swipe or hamburger)
Side Menu Items (in order): Chat (current screen), Scan (convo or profile scan), Consultant (resolution help), Safe Draft, Console, Profile, Upgrade to Pro

acceptanceCriteria: Left side menu is accessible via swipe gesture or hamburger icon
Menu items appear in exact order specified
Current active screen is visually indicated in the menu
Menu overlays content and can be dismissed

requirements.text: Transform home/chat screen to display large Gargoyle Dragon background with wings spread and glowing eyes, big glowing blood-red text saying 'Ready to Punch?', prominent 'START A GUT PUNCH' button styled like forged metal or burning stone, bottom input field with placeholder 'Type your punch…', and clear scan count display showing 'Scans left: 10/10' for free tier or 'Unlimited' for Pro

quotes: Large Gargoyle Dragon background (wings spread, glowing eyes)
Big glowing blood-red text: 'Ready to Punch?'
Prominent button: 'START A GUT PUNCH' (make it look like forged metal or burning stone)
Show scan count clearly: 'Scans left: 10/10' (or Unlimited on Pro)

acceptanceCriteria: Gargoyle Dragon image covers background with wings spread and glowing eyes visible
'Ready to Punch?' text is large, glowing, and blood-red colored
'START A GUT PUNCH' button has forged metal or burning stone visual treatment
Input field at bottom shows 'Type your punch…' placeholder
Scan counter displays '10/10' for free users and 'Unlimited' for Pro subscribers
Scan counter updates in real-time as scans are used

requirements.text: Update scan screen to display 'Scan a Convo or Profile' heading and show 'Scan Limit Reached – Upgrade to Pro for Unlimited' message after 10 scans are used on free tier

quotes: After 10 scans: 'Scan Limit Reached – Upgrade to Pro for Unlimited'

acceptanceCriteria: Scan screen displays 'Scan a Convo or Profile' as main heading
After 10th scan on free tier, display 'Scan Limit Reached – Upgrade to Pro for Unlimited' message
Scan functionality is blocked for free users after limit reached
Pro users see no scan limit message

requirements.text: Create therapist/Pro mode interface with calmer dragon aesthetic, focused design, and tools including session notes, resolution guidance, and session management features

quotes: Therapist / Pro Mode: Still dark dragon aesthetic but calmer and more focused
Tools for session notes, resolution guidance, keeping sessions on track

acceptanceCriteria: Therapist mode maintains dark dragon theme but with muted, calmer color palette
Session notes feature allows creating and saving notes
Resolution guidance tools are accessible and functional
Session management tools help track and organize therapeutic sessions
Only accessible to Pro tier users

requirements.text: Update all user-facing text and messaging to use raw, direct language including phrases 'Punch through the bullshit', 'The Dragon guards your truth', 'No filters. No games', and eliminate all corporate or overly polished language

quotes: Use phrases like 'Punch through the bullshit', 'The Dragon guards your truth', 'No filters. No games'

acceptanceCriteria: All UI text uses direct, raw language without corporate terminology
Specified phrases appear naturally throughout the interface
Empty states, error messages, and help text maintain raw, aggressive tone
No overly polished or formal language in user-facing copy

requirements.text: Update branding throughout application from 'GUT-PUNCH' to 'ForeverRaw – Home of the Gargoyle Dragon', ensuring the Gargoyle Dragon is the central visual element on all screens

quotes: Brand Name: ForeverRaw – Home of the Gargoyle Dragon
Use the Gargoyle Dragon (the one I drew) as the central visual everywhere

acceptanceCriteria: Application name displays as 'ForeverRaw' or 'ForeverRaw – Home of the Gargoyle Dragon' in headers and branding
Gargoyle Dragon image appears as central visual element on all major screens
Previous 'GUT-PUNCH' branding is completely replaced
Logo and favicon updated to reflect ForeverRaw branding

constraints: Maintain existing free tier (unlimited chat + 10 scans/day) and Pro tier (unlimited scans) functionality
Keep existing backend actor structure and API endpoints
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Chat must remain the main/host screen at all times
nonGoals: Changing the underlying technology stack (React, Motoko, Tailwind)
Changing the backend data models or storage structure

required: Gargoyle Dragon with wings spread and glowing eyes for background, dark mythical style, suitable for hero section (gargoyle-dragon-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
Gargoyle Dragon logo icon version for header/branding, dark background with red/orange accents (gargoyle-dragon-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Forged metal or burning stone texture for button background, dark with ember glow (button-texture.dim_400x120.png)
Cracked stone texture overlay, subtle, tileable, dark (stone-texture.dim_512x512.png)
Dragon scale texture overlay, subtle, tileable, dark (dragon-scale-texture.dim_512x512.png)
